name: Die Noob!
description:
You are an adventurer who travels between different worlds to discover new creatures and environments. A friendly creature invites you to their world, you follow them through a portal, and a huge surprise awaits.

Earn a high score by reaching the exit quickly and defeating opponents.

Controls:
Movement - A/D/LEFT/RIGHT
Jump - SPACE
Attack - ENTER

Credits:
Made for University of Tartu MITS IXS game jam 20.05-22.05.22
Team ToruSiilid
Daniil Lepkin - Programming, level design
Kaur Samuel Kannel - Programming
Kaisa Uik - Visuals, design
Karl Erik Saks - Language philosophy, design
Qumarosh Abbas Khan - Audio
Font: Pokemon Classic
